_header: Saint Luke us leres in his lesson
_description: Gospel for the Seventeenth Sunday after Trinity in the ‘expanded’ Northern Homily Cycle

BLHar4196.First Lines: Saint luke vs leres in his lessouneAls ihesus crist went fra towne to towne…
BLHar4196.Last Lines: …And he þat lawes him seluen hereSall be enhied in heuin clere
BLHar4196.Note: Preceded by Latin, “Cum intrauit ihesus crist in domum cuiusdam.”
BLHar4196.Editions:
Nevanlinna,  Sara. 
             The Northern Homily Cycle: The Expanded Version in MSS Harley 4196 and Cotton Tiberius E.vii.
             3 vols. 
             Memoires de la Societé Neophilologique de Helsinki.
         Helsinki. 38 (1972); 41 (1973); and 43 (1984): III.138-140.
